artist: Engraver: Adriaen Matham; Painter: After Frans Hals
description: half length portrait of man facing right, looking at viewer; right hand on a baton; wearing white lace collar and cuffs on a doublet; chain around neck; in a lettered oval frame
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

around frame in black: Co PIETER VANDEN BROECKE VAN ANTWERPEN ÆTATIS SVA 48 ANNO CIC ICC XXXIII | below frame 4 lines in german / in plate lower edge in black: F. Hals pinx    A Matham fe | on sheet in pencil: 2-35 | on mat in pencil H.XI.213.55 | on sheet verso in pencil: gangani aue[?] 31/8=6f/ April 14/ 1842
title: Portrait of Pieter vanden Broecke
